items.title: Here's how RFK Jr.'s hand-picked vaccine advisory committee is starting to reshape vaccine policy
items.description: A federal vaccine advisory committee signaled a new approach to U.S. vaccine policy after a two-day meeting.

items.title: What does the CDC panel vote on childhood vaccine changes mean?
items.description: Will Stone summarizes the CDC advisory committee's rollback of two vaccines for kids and the restrictions on the COVID-19 vaccine.
